item.title: Poking around the HOPI HP-9800
item.description: Playing with the HOPI HP-9800 Here’s a link to the GitHub repository I recently bought one of these power analysers from eBay after seeing it used by Big Clive on his YouTube channel. Once it arrived, I spotted a MicroUSB port on the top edge. Plugging in a cable and trying to connect achieved absolutely nothing, so I did a little reading and took it as an excuse to learn more Go.
